content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello Mister Heine, thank you for inviting me to see the apartment. I am interested in renting this apartment for the lowest possible price. Can you tell me what the proposed rental price is?
name: Bo Li

content:
The proposed rental price is 600 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?

Please keep in mind that Heine is a landlord who wants to maximize his gains.

TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would be happy to negotiate with you to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement regarding the rental price. Can you provide any additional information or flexibility in your rental price?
name: Bo Li

content:
There is no flexibility. The rental price is set at 600 Euros per month. Would you agree to this price?

Please keep in mind that Heine is a landlord who wants to maximize his gains.

TERMINATE
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I apologize, but I am unable to agree to the rental price of 600 Euros per month. I am looking for a more affordable option that fits within my budget. I would appreciate the opportunity to discuss other options or potential negotiations with you. Thank you for your time.
name: Bo Li
